title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Multimedia e-Learning Course Design for Understanding Kawasaki Disease

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge (immune system, infectious disease symptoms) and experience in chronic disease management
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: The five major symptoms of Kawasaki disease and types of complications can be identified with 90% accuracy
Acute-phase patient response protocols can be replicated in three or more stages through VR simulation
Individual/group prevention strategies can be presented project-based in community patient management scenarios
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
